# Tennis Court Booking Monitor - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
A Python-based system for monitoring tennis court booking systems to automatically book available courts as they become available on the same day, with real-time alerts and automation capabilities.

## Development Setup Status
- [ ] Project scaffolded and dependencies installed
- [ ] Initial testing confirmed working
- [ ] Documentation complete

## Key Features (Planned)
- Real-time monitoring of available tennis courts
- Automated booking capability when courts become available
- Same-day availability alerts
- Web scraping or API integration for booking system
- Configuration for user preferences and court preferences
